name: What is MVC (Model View Controller)?
description: Model view controller (MVC) is a software architectural pattern for implementing user interfaces. It divides a given software application into three interconnected parts, so as to separate internal representation of information from the way that information is presented to or accepted from the user.

name: What are the main differences between SQL and NoSQL databases?
description: SQL databases are table-based, while NoSQL databases are non-relational. This means that a SQL database contains structured data and can perform an analysis using a relational model.

name: Object-Relational Mapping
description: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
